Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Model B better captures the integration of resources for community development.

gemini_critique.critique: No revisions needed. Model B's analysis aligns with mine on key SDGs, but my original scores are better supported by the course text, especially for indirect contributions and the explicit project goals.
